EMAIL.LABEL: Account Email
EMAIL.PLACEHOLDER: Please enter a name of the agent

RESOLVE.LABEL: Number of days after a ticket should auto resolve if there is no activity

ACCOUNT_ID.LABEL: Account ID
ACCOUNT_ID.DESC: This ID is required if you are building an API based integration

USER_STATUS.POP_TEXT: Automatically unassign and re-queue a users Open and Snoozed conversations when their status changed to below status
USER_STATUS.SUB_GENERAL: General settings that are applied to all of your queues
USER_STATUS.DESC: A Contact Field tracks facts about your contacts â€” like the subscription plan, or when they ordered the first item etc. For creating a Contact Field.
USER_STATUS.REOPEN: Automatic Reopen a Conversation if Customer Came Back within
USER_STATUS.SUB_REOPEN: Reopen conversation will be assigned to the same old agent if available.

AGENT.TITLE: Agent Timeout
AGENT.SUB_TXT: The amount of time an agent can remain inactive in Dewan before being set to offline status. This setting can help catch situations where an agent forgets to go offline at the end of shift, or loses their internet connection.

API.ERROR_MESSAGE: Could not connect to Woot Server, Please try again later
